item.title: aZz add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: aZz add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: aZz add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: aZz add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: aZz add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: aZz add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: aZz add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: aZz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: aZz add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right." -- Henry Ford

item.title: aZz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: aZz add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: aZz add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Cinta yang suci menempatkan ukuran fisik hanya di nomor 10 dari 10 kriteria" -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: aZz add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: aZz add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: aZz add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Tuhan tahu, tapi menunggu ..... " -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: aZz add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: aZz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: aZz add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: aZz add a quote by Jude Deveraux
item.description: "My soul will find yours." -- Jude Deveraux

item.title: aZz add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: aZz add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: aZz add a quote by Tuteh
item.description: "Temukan dirimu pada sahabat-sahabatmu" -- Tuteh

item.title: aZz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Words are easy, like the wind; Faithful friends are hard to find." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: aZz add a quote by C. J. Langenhoven
item.description: "Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected. " -- C. J. Langenhoven

item.title: aZz add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies." -- Aristotle

item.title: aZz add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
aZz add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "A house without books is like a room without windows." -- Horace Mann

item.title: aZz add a quote by Vincent Willem van Gogh
item.description: "I dream my painting and I paint my dream." -- Vincent Willem van Gogh

item.title: aZz add a quote by Mario Teguh
item.description: "Tuhan tidak pernah memberikan harapan, tanpa kepantasan untuk mencapainya. " -- Mario Teguh

item.title: aZz add a quote by Dr. 'Aidh Abdullah Al-Qarni
item.description: "Jika sebuah tali itu sudah sangat mengencang, itu tandanya akan putus. Jika malam sudah gelap gulita, itu tandanya bahwa kegelapan akan segera lenyap. Jika sebuah masalah itu sudah sangat menghimpit, itu tandanya akan ada jalan keluar." -- Dr. 'Aidh Abdullah Al-Qarni
